Class ChromaticAberration: adds lateral chromatic aberration by distorting red and blue channels differently, leaving green unchanged. Parameters: primary and secondary distortion limits (radial distortion coefficients), mode (color fringing type), interpolation, probability. Applies to RGB images only. So summary: transform that simulates lens chromatic aberration by applying radial distortion to color channels, creating color fringing.

Business intent: augment image data for training robust computer vision models, especially to make models invariant to lens artifacts, improve generalization.

Keywords: chromatic aberration, color fringing, radial distortion, image augmentation, RGB channels, lens artifact simulation, data augmentation, computer vision, distortion coefficients, interpolation.
